ygData.subject: Re:
ygData.msgSnippet: Too bad the Reaper of the Dead is only achieved via a Dark Elf quest.  It is a scithe with 14dmg 40spd +4str and one charge of Complete Healing (yep, an SK Lay
ygData.messageBody:
Too bad the Reaper of the Dead is only achieved via a Dark Elf quest. It is
a scithe with 14dmg 40spd +4str and one charge of Complete Healing (yep, an
SK Lay Hands)and LORE. Any SK can use it, you just need to be a DE to do
the quest. Eventually you get the Ring of the Dead but it is DE only as
well. The Reaper sells to merchants for about 10plat, so you get a nice
return before you do the quest again and this is a great quest for gaining
faction with The Dead of Neriak.

Xillith
Rallos Zek



>From: dissonance@...
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>Subject: [eq_shadowknights]
>Date: 13 Oct 1999 16:09:17 -0000
>
>BTW, the Pestilence Scythe is a magic, lore, no drop item found on Lord
>Grimrot, who stands in the ruins immediately south of the white bridge in
>South Karana. He's a level 35 SK that is a lot tougher than he seems, and
>if you kill him OR any of the putrid skeletons guarding him your factions
>drop with the Bloodsabers and go up with Qeynos guards, etc. The
>Bloodsabers are the human SK guild in Qeynos who worship Bertoxxulous.
>Stats on the scythe are as follows. 16 dmg, 48 dlay, +10 poison and disease
>save, and has one charge for Vampiric Curse. I wasn't able to see the exact
>effects of this spell, so I'm fairly anxious to figure out how to recharge
>it. If it can be recharged, that is. It can be used by warriors, SK's, and
>necromancers (although I think it should be SK and necro only!) I got this
>scythe for the look of my character, and for the storyline we have. Sure
>there's better weapons.. but until there's a better scythe this is what
>I'll be using. =)
>
>- Envy of Tunare
>
>
><< text3.html >>
